Description:
We are looking for candidates with the followingSales/BD experience in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Platform

5-7 Years of experience in IT Application Sales
Strong Technical background in IT in the Application segment.
Proven track record in managing clients and maintaining customer satisfaction
Drives successful outcomes through collaboration, influence and partnership in a complex environment
Team player with good discipline organized way of working and ability to work autonomously;
Passionate, self-starter, with personal drive and ambition;
Ability and desire to succeed in a diverse, multicultural environment, across varied geographies and team
Willingness to travel as requiredJob Details
